ARABIC: أَوْ إِطْعَٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: or feeding on a day of hunger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or to feed in times of famine
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: or giving food on a day of hunger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: or, in a day of famine, the feeding of
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or the feeding on a day of hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or giving food in a day full of Masghabah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or the giving of food in a day of hunger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: or giving food upon a day of hunger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And to feed in the day of hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: or the feeding in times of famine
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or, feeding, in a day of privation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: or feeding, during days of [general] starvation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or the giving of food in a day of privation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or giving food in a day of hunger (famine),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: the giving of food upon the day of hunger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or the feeding on a day of hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [90:14] or to give food on a day of hunger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And to feed in the day of hunger) and hardship
